feed.title: WeddingShare Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.5.6
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Fixed a bug in the email validation around the - character in the domain portion of the email address.

Changed

  • Modified Italian translations as per the PRs provided by https://github.com/albanobattistella.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.5.5...1.5.6

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.5.7
entry.content:
Added

  • Added gallery banner images with the GALLERY_BANNER_IMAGE environment variable.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.5.6...1.5.7

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.5.7.1
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Fixed a bug whereby the gallery logo was displaying blank on non-default galleries.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.5.7...1.5.7.1

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.5.7.2
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Fixed a bug whereby the gallery banner was displaying blank on non-default galleries.
  • Fixed an issue whereby account username was not converted to lower case before generating password hashes.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.5.7.1...1.5.7.2

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.5.8
entry.content:
Added

  • Added a filter to the gallery to allow filtering by media type.

Fixed

  • Fixed a bug whereby on some devices a blank bar would appear down the right side of the display.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.5.7...1.5.8
